input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light

Product features:
Charged by the sun during the day.
Dragonfly automatically illuminates and changes color at night
Color-changing LED (Red, Green, Blue)
Perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool
Rechargeable battery included
Light will operate 6 to 8 hours after a full charge
environmentally friendly,energy-saving, reduces carbon emission
3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Are you looking for a unique and beautiful wind chime to add to your home? Look no further than the Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime! This stunning piece is made with superb metal craftsmanship and features genuine Swarovski crystals. The wind chime is not only beautiful but also responds authoritatively, assertively, and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

The wind chime is the perfect gift for any occasion, and it is sure to be a conversation starter. It is also a great way to add a touch of elegance to your home. The chrome plating on the wind chime gives it a sleek and modern look, while the genuine Austrian crystals add a touch of sparkle and shine.

So why wait? Add the Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime to your home today and experience the beauty and elegance of this stunning piece!
input_text.Response B: Enjoy your backyard pool or garden area even after the sun sets with this cool Lumisol Solar Color-Changing Dragonfly Pool Light. This eco-friendly light is powered by the sun and transforms your pool or garden into a colorful illuminated area. Rechargeable battery included. Simply place the light in the sun to charge and the light will operate 6 to 8 hours after a full charge. The light will automatically illuminate and change color at night. Color-changing LED (Red, Green, Blue). It measures 3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
